typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Oracle.Data memory,uint256) view external returns (uint256)
function (contract IOverlayV1Market,struct Oracle.Data memory) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text:
@dev fractionOfCapOi = oi / capOi as FixedPoint
 @dev handles capOi == 0 edge case by returning type(uint256).max

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract IOverlayV1Market,struct Oracle.Data memory) view returns (uint256)
function (contract IOverlayV1Market,struct Oracle.Data memory,uint256) view returns (uint256)
function (struct Roller.Snapshot memory,uint256,uint256,int256) view returns (struct Roller.Snapshot memory)

ask(address,uint256).notice: Gets the ask price trader will receive on the Overlay marketassociated with the given feed address given fraction ofcap on open interest trade represents

bid(address,uint256).notice: Gets the bid price trader will receive on the Overlay marketassociated with the given feed address given fraction ofcap on open interest trade represents

capOi(address).notice: Gets the current cap on open interest on the Overlay marketassociated with the given feed address accounting forfront and back-running bounds

returns.capOi_: as the current open interest cap

circuitBreakerLevel(address).details: circuit breaker level is reported as fraction of capOi in FixedPoint
circuitBreakerLevel(address).notice: Gets the current level of the circuit breaker for theopen interest cap on the Overlay market associated withthe given feed address

returns.circuitBreakerLevel_: as the current circuit breaker level

data(address).notice: Gets the oracle data from the given feed

fractionOfCapOi(address,uint256).notice: Gets the fraction of the current open interest cap thegiven oi contracts represents on the Overlay marketassociated with the given feed address

returns.fractionOfCapOi_: as fraction of open interest cap given oi is

fundingRate(address).details: f = 2 * k * ( oiLong - oiShort ) / (oiLong + oiShort)such that long > short then positive
fundingRate(address).notice: Gets the current funding rate on the Overlay marketassociated with the given feed address

market(address).notice: Gets the Overlay market address for the given feed

mid(address).notice: Gets the mid price from feed used for liquidationson the Overlay market associated with the given feed address

minted(address).details: minted_ > 0 means more OVL has been minted than burned recently
minted(address).notice: Gets the current rolling amount minted (+) or burned (-)by the Overlay market associated with the given feed address

returns.minted_: as the current rolling amount minted

ois(address).notice: Gets the current open interest values on the Overlay marketassociated with the given feed address accounting for funding

returns.oiLong_: as the current open interest long
returns.oiShort_: as the current open interest short

prices(address).notice: Gets the current bid, ask, and mid price values on theOverlay market associated with the given feed addressaccounting for recent volume

returns.mid_: as the current mid price from feed

volumeAsk(address,uint256).notice: Gets the rolling volume on the ask after the trader placestrade on the Overlay market associated with the given feedaddress given fraction of cap on open interest trade represents

returns.volumeAsk_: as the volume on the ask

volumeBid(address,uint256).notice: Gets the rolling volume on the bid after the trader placestrade on the Overlay market associated with the given feedaddress given fraction of cap on open interest trade represents

returns.volumeBid_: as the volume on the bid

volumes(address).notice: Gets the current rolling volume on the bid and ask sidesof the Overlay market associated with the given feed address

returns.volumeAsk_: as the current rolling volume on the ask
returns.volumeBid_: as the current rolling volume on the bid
